channel.title: TGaceAllStories
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from TGaceAllStories, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: ‘Opening up to possibilities’: Olympic diver Greg Louganis on his new life in Panama at 65, after auctioning off his gold medals
item.description: Olympic star Greg Louganis has offered a glimpse inside his life after leaving the U.S.—months after he auctioned his medals to raise the funds he nee...

item.title: My friend, who had no children or wife, died suddenly. His sister is contesting his will. Will she succeed?
item.description: “He did not intend to leave anything to his sister, his only living relative.”

item.title: Why stocks will sidestep 1920s and 1987 parallels, according to Goldman Sachs
item.description: In a new note, strategists led by Ben Snider warn the market is about to navigate a difficult environment.

item.title: Trump says Venezuela will send U.S. up to 50 million barrels of oil — and he’ll control the proceeds
item.description: President Donald Trump late Tuesday said Venezuela will send the U.S. 30 million to 50 million barrels of oil, which will then be sold by the U.S. and...

item.title: An ounce of gold now buys 80 barrels of oil, and other eye-opening stats
item.description: Silver’s market capitalization has overtaken that of America’s most valuable company, Nvidia, as one ounce of gold buys 80 barrels of oil.

item.title: Wednesday's big stock stories: What’s likely to move the market in the next trading session
item.description: The S&P 500 and Dow rose to records on Tuesday, with the blue-chip index closing above 49,000 for the first time.

item.title: January effect: Citadel Securities says big money to flow into stocks this month
item.description: January has historically been the best month for capital equity deployment, according to Citadel Securities.

item.title: Income investors can use this strategy to boost 2026 performance, according to Morningstar
item.description: Companies have been snapping up their own shares. Adding a few of those stocks to your portfolio may lift performance.

item.title: Morgan Stanley says buy these defense stocks post Venezuela and Iran
item.description: The firm is highlighting Northrop Grumman and other defense names in light of recent U.S. missions, according to a client note.

item.description: Todd Gordon breaks down the technicals on this LatAm giant.
